Script.name: README
Script.script:
--[[ DGR Mudlet GUI
Base package with EMCO included (no GUI scripts yet).
Author: Demonnic Contributor: WizzyDizzy
Install - lua installPackage("https://github.com/dragonsgatereborn/DGR-Mudlet-GUI/releases/latest/download/DGRGUI.mpackage")
Commands - gui update - gui restart - gui version
Notes - Do not add or change anything inside DGRGUI package folders. - Updates overwrite package contents and remove local edits.
EMCO - local emco = require("DGRGUI.emco") --]]

Alias.name: gui update
Alias.script:
local currentVersion = "0.1.0" local repoUrl = "https://github.com/dragonsgatereborn/DGR-Mudlet-GUI" local packageUrl = repoUrl .. "/releases/latest/download/DGRGUI.mpackage"
cecho("<green>DGR GUI: <reset>Current version: " .. currentVersion .. "
") cecho("<green>DGR GUI: <reset>Updating from " .. repoUrl .. "
")
uninstallPackage("DGRGUI") installPackage(packageUrl)
cecho("<green>DGR GUI: <reset>Update complete! Package installed from:
") cecho("<green>DGR GUI: <reset>" .. packageUrl .. "
")

Alias.name: gui restart
Alias.script:
cecho("<green>DGR GUI: <reset>Restarting GUI...
") if DGRGUI and DGRGUI.start then DGRGUI.start() cecho("<green>DGR GUI: <reset>Restart complete.
") else cecho("<green>DGR GUI: <reset>No start() found yet. Nothing to restart.
") end

Alias.name: gui version
Alias.script:
local version = "0.1.0" local repo = "https://github.com/dragonsgatereborn/DGR-Mudlet-GUI"
cecho("<green>DGR GUI
") cecho("<green>Version: <yellow>" .. version .. "
") cecho("<green>Repository: <cyan>dragonsgatereborn/DGR-Mudlet-GUI
") cecho("<green>GitHub: <cyan>" .. repo .. "
")
